ingredients: ["2 cups all-purpose flour", "14 teaspoon salt", "4 teaspoons baking powder", "12 cup sugar", "1 34 cups milk", "2 eggs", "1 tablespoon vanilla", "12 cup butter (melted)"]
directions: ["Mix the dry ingredients and then add the butter, milk, eggs, and vanilla.", "Whisk until smooth.", "Cook in waffle iron per manufactures instructions or personal preference.", "Enjoy with choice of breakfast meat, and fresh juice or milk.", "**Cook to order , as they are always best served warm, and they freeze nicely too***."]

title: Pancetta Or Side Pork Fried Cabbage
ingredients: ["8 ounces pancetta or 1/2 lb of side pork, diced", "16 ounces coleslaw mix", "1 onion, diced"]
directions: ["In a large frying pan, brown pancetta or side pork until lightly browned (about 10 mins.) Add onion to pancetta and stir often until onion is sauteed (about another 10 mins.) Add cole slaw mix and stir often (for about another 10 mins.) until cabbage is totally wilted and done.", "The cabbage will look like a lot at first but it really cooks down.", "Add pepper to taste.", "I have used proportionate amount of bacon for this recipe with excellent results."]

title: Pretzel Jello
ingredients: ["2 c. crushed pretzels", "2/3 c. butter, melted", "1/3 c. sugar"]
directions: ["You will need 2 glass pans."]

title: Blueberry Graham Pancakes
ingredients: ["1-1/2 cups Honey Maid Graham Crumbs", "1/2 cup flour", "1 tsp. Magic Baking Powder", "1 egg", "1-1/2 cups milk", "2 Tbsp. honey", "3/4 cup fresh blueberries"]
directions: ["Mix first 3 ingredients in medium bowl.", "Whisk egg, milk and honey with whisk until well blended.", "Add to flour mixture; stir just until blended.", "Gently stir in berries.", "Heat large skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat.", "Ladle 1/4 cup batter into skillet for each pancake; cook 2-3 min.", "or until bubbles form on tops, then turn over to brown other sides."]

title: Asian Coconut Water Roasted Potatoes
ingredients: ["FOR THE DRESSING:", "1 cup Coconut Water", "2 Blood Oranges, Juiced", "1 clove Garlic, Minced Finely", "1/2 teaspoons Whole Grain Mustard", "1/2 teaspoons Sea Salt", "1/2 teaspoons Freshly Ground Black Pepper", "1/2 cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "FOR THE POTATOES:", "2 pounds Baby Red Potatoes", "1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 Tablespoon Low Sodium Soy Sauce", "1/8 teaspoons Sea Salt", "1/4 teaspoons Freshly Ground Black Pepper", "1/2 cups Blood Orange Coconut Water Salad Dressing (Recipe Included)", "1/4 teaspoons Chives"]
directions: ["For the blood orange coconut water salad dressing:", "Place all ingredients, except for olive oil, in a blender and puree for 1 minute. With blender on, slowly drizzle in olive oil and puree for 1 additional minute.", "For the potatoes:", "Preheat oven to 400\u00b0F.", "Rinse potatoes and dice in halves or quarters, making them all a uniform size. Place on baking sheet lined with tin foil. Drizzle with olive oil, soy sauce, and then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Use hands to mix potatoes, and then evenly distribute on baking sheet skin-side facing up. Roast 20 minutes.", "Drizzle with blood orange coconut water salad dressing, then roast for an additional 5 minutes. Top with chives before serving."]

title: Traditional Banh Xeo with Nuoc Cham Sauce
ingredients: ["1 clove garlic, peeled", "1/4 red Thai bird's eye chile", "1/4 cup fish sauce", "1/4 cup sugar", "1 tablespoon fresh lime juice", "1/4 cup Thai rice flour", "1 small scallion, very thinly sliced", "Pinch fine sea salt", "Pinch ground turmeric", "Vegetable oil", "5 small (26/30 count) shrimp, shelled and deveined", "1 strip thick-cut bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces", "1 large egg, beaten", "1/2 cup bean sprouts", "8 green and red lettuce leaves", "4 shiso leaves", "Fresh basil leaves", "Fresh cilantro leaves", "Fresh dill sprigs", "Fresh mint leaves"]
directions: ["For the sauce: Pound the garlic and chile in a large mortar with a pestle until pasty.", "Whisk in the fish sauce, sugar, lime juice, and 1 cup water until the sugar dissolves.", "Transfer to a serving bowl for dipping.", "For the banh xeo: Whisk the flour together with the scallion, salt, turmeric and 1/4 cup cold water in a bowl until completely smooth.", "Set aside.", "Heat a well-seasoned 9-inch carbon steel skillet over high heat until smoking hot.", "Add enough oil to coat the bottom of the pan generously and swirl to lightly coat the sides too.", "Add the shrimp and bacon, and cook, stirring and tossing, until the shrimp start to curl but before they become completely opaque, about 1 minute.", "Whisk the batter again to mix in any flour that has settled on the bottom and ladle a spoonful into the pan.", "Swirl the pan to coat the bottom and an inch or so up the sides with a thin layer of the batter.", "Repeat two more times.", "Let the batter set, about 30 seconds.", "Drizzle the egg over the crepe and swirl the pan to evenly coat the crepe with egg.", "The crepe should have released from the sides of the pan; squirt oil between the crepe edges and the pan.", "Gently shake the pan to keep everything moving.", "Poke a hole in the crepe with a fork or spoon to keep it from bubbling up-- you want a flat crepe.", "Oil should be sputtering at the edges of the crepe.", "If it isn't, add more.", "Cook the crepe, oiling and shaking until the egg has set on top and the bottom of the crepe is dark brown around the edges and in speckles on the bottom.", "Pile the bean sprouts on one half and fold the other half over with a spatula.", "Hold the folded omelet against one side of the pan and tilt the oil out the other side into a heat-safe bowl.", "Discard.", "Lift the omelet out of the pan with the spatula and immediately serve with the shrimp and bacon, lettuce and shiso leaves, herbs and nuoc cham.", "Tear off a piece of omelet with a bunch of bean sprouts and tuck it into a lettuce leaf with a shiso leaf and some bacon and shrimp.", "Pluck a few fresh herb leaves of basil, cilantro, dill and mint, and stuff them in there too.", "Then roll it up and dip into the nuoc cham.", "Eat.", "Repeat."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["3 c. beets, sliced", "1/2 c. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 whole cloves", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. orange marmalade"]
directions: ["In double boiler mix sugar, cornstarch, salt, cloves and vinegar.", "Stir until smooth.", "Cook and stir until clear.", "Add beets and leave over hot water about 30 minutes.", "Just before serving, heat, but do not boil.", "Add butter and marmalade."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. chocolate drink powder", "2 (1 oz.) bottles red food coloring", "1 1/2 c. cooking oil", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 1/4 c. cake flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla flavoring", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. baking soda"]
directions: ["Mix and set aside chocolate drink powder and red food coloring."]

title: Curried Turkey Meatballs in Rogan Josh Sauce
ingredients: ["500 g ground turkey", "1 egg", "12 cup breadcrumbs", "2 garlic cloves, finely minced", "1 tablespoon gingerroot, finely minced", "1 small onion, finely diced", "1 tablespoon curry powder", "1 tablespoon lemon juice", "2 tablespoons fresh coriander, finely chopped (cilantro)", "salt and pepper", "2 tablespoons oil", "1 (500 g) jar curry sauce, I used Rogan Josh"]
directions: ["Mix all the ingredients for the meat balls together in a large bowl.", "Form into golf ball sized balls (you should get about 20).", "Heat the oil in a large heavy bottomed frying pan over medium heat and cook the balls until browned all over and cooked through.", "Be careful turning them as they will be quite delicate.", "When the meatballs are done, drain them on kitchen paper and wash out the pan.", "Pour in the jar of sauce and cook the meatballs gently for 15 minutes or until well heated through.", "Serve over rice garnished with extra coriander if you wish."]

title: Apple Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) block cream cheese, softened", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 c. nuts", "1/2 c. raisins"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, sugar and almond until smooth (add 2 tablespoons milk if necessary), then add nuts and raisins.", "Serve with apple slices."]

title: Herbed Cream Cheese
ingredients: ["16 ounces cream cheese, softened", "12 cup fresh basil, finely chopped", "14 cup fresh chives, finely chopped", "2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl and blend well.", "Serve with toasted bagels."]

title: Deer Over Coals
ingredients: ["6 deer steaks", "1 1/2 c. dry red wine", "1/2 c. wine vinegar", "3/4 c. olive oil", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 bay leaf, crushed", "1 can mushrooms", "salt and lemon pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all the ingredients, except the deer and mushrooms, in a large pot.", "Add steaks and marinate in refrigerator 6 hours.", "If the meat is frozen, do not defrost, just increase the marinating time by at least 2 hours.", "Cook the steaks on a grill over hot coals for about 4 minutes on each side or until doneness, basting with marinating sauce several times.", "Heat the mushrooms in butter for a steak topping."]

title: Microwave Toasted Butter Pecans
ingredients: ["1 lb. pecan halves (4 c.)", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1/4 c. oleo"]
directions: ["Put pecan halves into a 1-quart measuring cup.", "Sprinkle with salt.", "Cut oleo into 4 pieces and place over top of pecans.", "Put in microwave and cook for 8 to 10 minutes on High.", "Mix evenly to distribute oleo.", "Drain on paper towels.", "Yields 1 pound."]

title: Carolina Baked Ham
ingredients: ["salt-cured ham", "vinegar", "onion", "bay leaves", "sugar", "lemon peel", "brown sugar", "dry mustard", "cloves"]
directions: ["Soak a salt-cured ham overnight in water and 1 cup vinegar covered pan.", "Drain.", "Cover with hot water.", "Add another 1 cup vinegar; simmer until parboiled.", "Drain and rinse.", "Again, place ham in hot water; cover and add 2 bay leaves, 3 tablespoons sugar and strip of lemon peel with chopped onions.", "Gently simmer until tender (about 3 hours).", "Mix 1 cup brown sugar and 1 teaspoon dry mustard.", "Pat mixture on ham and stud a few cloves.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Bavarian Brownies
ingredients: ["1 pkg. German chocolate cake mix", "1/3 c. milk", "1/4 c. margarine, softened", "1 egg", "6 oz. butterscotch or chocolate chips", "1 c. walnuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease and flour 13 x 9-inch pan.", "In a large bowl, combine cake mix, milk, egg and margarine.", "Stir in chips and nuts.", "Batter will be very thick.", "Spread in pan.", "Bake 20 to 30 minutes.", "Cool completely.", "Cut into 36 bars."]

title: Lime-Soy-Sesame Broccoli
ingredients: ["2 tablespoons canola oil", "1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil", "4 cups broccoli florets, steamed", "1 tablespoon fresh lime juice", "1 1/2 teaspoons fish sauce", "1 teaspoon lower-sodium soy sauce", "1 teaspoon sugar", "1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper"]
directions: ["Heat canola oil and toasted -sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add steamed broccoli florets; saute 1 minute or until lightly browned. Add lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar, and crushed red pepper; cook 30 seconds or until liquid almost evaporates."]

title: Double Chocolate Trifle
ingredients: ["1 pkg. (18.25 oz.) brownie mix or 1 box Little Debbie brownies", "2 c. cold milk", "2 (3.4 oz.) pkg. chocolate instant pudding and pie filling", "2 c. frozen whipped topping, thawed", "3 (1.5 oz.) toffee bars, coarsely chopped"]
directions: ["In quart bowl, whisk pudding mix into milk using 10-inch whisk until mixture begins to thicken.", "Fold in whipped topping using rubber scraper.", "Crumble 1/3 brownies into bottom of Chillzanne bowl.", "Top with 1/3 of pudding", "mixture, pressing lightly.", "Top with 1/3 toffee.", "Repeat last step 2 more times. Chill 30 minutes before serving.", "Yields 12 servings."]

title: Creamed Spinach And Sweet Potato
ingredients: ["2 tsp butter", "1 tsp olive oil", "1 medium onion, finely chopped", "1 pkg (16 oz) frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry", "1 1/4 cups heavy cream", "3/4 cup milk", "1 1/3 lbs sweet potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced", "1 1/3 lbs potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced", "1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Preheat the oven to 424\u00b0F. Oil a deep 13 x 9-inch baking dish.", "Melt butter and oil in large skillet on medium heat. Cook onion until soft. Add spinach, half of the cream and 1/2 cup of the milk; cook, stirring for 2 mins.", "Place a third each of the sweet potato and potato, slightly overlapping, in dish. Spread with half the spinach mixture. Repeat layering, ending with sweet potato and potato. Pour remaining combined cream and milk over the top. Sprinkle with cheese.", "Bake, covered, for about 1 hour or until potato is tender. Uncover and bake for a further 10 mins or until lightly browned."]

title: In-N-Out Pizza
ingredients: ["1/2 pounds Ground Beef", "4 whole Pickles, Sliced", "5 whole Roma Tomatoes, Sliced", "1 whole Medium Red Onion, Sliced", "1 block (8 Oz. Block) Cheddar Cheese, Grated", "1 block (8 Oz. Block) Jack Cheese (Spice It Up With Pepper Jack!)", "1 whole Small Head Of Romaine Lettuce", "1 bottle (16 Oz. Bottle) Thousand Island Dressing (Wish Bone Or Your Favorite Kind)", "1 whole Pizza Dough (approximately 16 Inches Round)"]
directions: ["Another pizza for you to try out!", "I hope you like it.", "Cook the beef, break it up nice and good.", "Slice the pickles, tomatoes, and onion.", "Grate the cheeses.", "Wash and chop romaine lettuce.", "Put as much Thousand Island dressing on the dough as you would like.", "Sprinkle on the beef, then layer the toppings on top of the beef: pickle, tomatoes, onion.", "Sprinkle enough jack cheese to cover toppings, but allowing them to still be seen.", "Sprinkle on some cheddar to fill in the gaps and only allow some of the toppings to be seen.", "Bake at 400 degrees F for 10- 15 minutes or until cheese is nice and bubbly!", "Remove from oven and sprinkle lettuce on the top.", "Then, enjoy every bite!", "Note: The specific order in which you put the toppings on the dough does not alter the taste at all, so feel free to build it any way that you would like."]

title: Caviar Rounds
ingredients: ["rye bread rounds, toasted", "caviar", "hard-boiled eggs", "onion, finely minced"]
directions: ["Butter rounds or rye toast.", "Press on these rounds slices of the egg white; fill the inside of the egg white with caviar. Sprinkle finely minced onion over caviar.", "Surround egg white with grated yolk."]

title: Peanut Butter Icing
ingredients: ["6 tbsp peanut butter", "4 1/2 to 4 3/4 cups of powdered sugar", "1/4 cup milk", "1 1/2 tsp vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and mix until spreadable consistency."]
